tool_description: An api to add, retrieve and manage scores for games
name: Get Score Pro
title: Get Score Pro

api_list.name: Add score
api_list.description: Add score with gameId and userId
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://get-score-pro1.p.rapidapi.com/score"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-score-pro1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://get-score-pro1.p.rapidapi.com/score"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-score-pro1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
